name: Co-People
desc: A job portal connecting job seekers and providers, featuring registration, job listings, search options, and role-specific dashboards.

name: Job Portal
desc: A job portal developed using the MERN stack with user registration, job listings, search functionality, and role-specific dashboards.

name: Profile Manager
desc: A profile manager developed using the MERN stack with user authentication, profile creation, updates, and role-based access control.

name: DataEase
desc: A profile manager developed using java and React with user authentication, profile management, CRUD operations, and role-based access control.
